superhero.title: Help your students become superheroes!
superhero.body: Join our highly supportive Professional Learning Program for middle and high school educators.

hoc-2023.title: Hour of Code: Creativity with AI
hoc-2023.body: Join millions across the globe in organizing an hour of coding, with or without AI and learning how AI works. Anyone, anywhere can do it. No experience needed.

curriculum-launch-2024.title: Discover new and updated curriculum!
curriculum-launch-2024.body: Explore our latest units and professional learning resources to inspire future tech innovators.

progress-launch.title: Progress tracking just leveled up!
progress-launch.body: Effortlessly monitor student work, provide timely feedback, and simplify grading with our fast, teacher-tested interface. Save time and gain valuable insights into your students' performance, all in one intuitive tool.
